text: Aur bil-yaqeen hum ney (qom aad) ko woh maqdoor diye thay jo tumhen to diye bhi nahi aur hum ney unhen kaan aankhen aur dil bhi dey rakhay thay. Lekin inn kay kano aur dilon ney enhen kuch bhi nafa na phonchaya jabkay woh Allah Taalaa ki aayaton ka inkar kerney lagay aur jiss cheez ka woh mazak uraya kertay thay wohi unn per ulat pari
